title: Require CR ID in revision summaries for traceability

comment: QA Pre-Review: CR-004 is procedurally compliant and technically sound. Frontmatter meets SOP-001 Section 5.1 requirements. CR content satisfies all requirements per SOP-002 Section 6 (description, rationale, testing summary). The proposed CR ID prefix format for revision_summary is clear and will improve traceability. Execution plan follows proper workflow. Minor observation: the specific SOP-002 changes could be more detailed, but this can be verified during post-review. RECOMMEND proceeding to pre-approval.

QA Post-Review: CR-004 execution verified. SOP-001 v9.0 Section 5.1 now requires CR ID prefix in revision_summary with clear format and exception for v0.1. SOP-002 v2.0 contains new Section 8 (Document Traceability) with matching requirements. All test criteria passed. Execution complete and correct. RECOMMEND post-approval.
